column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ nda pii n'ekyir no
column3: EWURADZE n'asɛm baa Elija nkyɛn
column4: wɔ afe a otsia ebiasa no mu
column6: Kɔ
column7: keyi woho edzi kyerɛ Ahab; na mebɛma nsu atɔ egu asaase do."

column2: "Na Elija sii mu kɔr dɛ orikeyi noho edzi akyerɛ Ahab. Na ɔkɔm no mu yɛɛ dzen wɔ Samaria."
"Na Ahab frɛɛ Obadia a ɔhwɛ fidua no do no. (Nna Obadia suro EWURADZE dɛ:"

column3: aber a Jezebel rutwitwa EWURADZE no nkɔnhyɛfo no egu no
column4: Obadia faa nkɔnhyɛfo ɔha
column5: na ɔdze hɔn eduonum eduonum kosumasumaa ɔbo tu mu
column6: na ɔdze edziban na nsu hwɛɛ hɔn.)"

column3: Kɔ
column4: kekyin asaase no mu
column6: na nwora nyinara ho: bi a yebenya nkyɛkyɛr bi dze agye mpɔnkɔ na nsoasopɔnkɔ no nkwa

column2: "Nna wɔkyɛɛ asaase no mu maa hɔnho dɛ worikekyin do: Ahab nonko faa ɔkwan kor do
column3: na Obadia nonko so faa ɔkwan kor do."

column2: "Na Obadia nam ɔkwan no mu no
column3: hwɛ
column4: Elija nye no hyiae: na ohun no
column6: na ɔsee dɛ
column7: Ana ɔwo mo wura Elija nye no a?"

column3: Emi nye no: kɔ
column4: kɛka kyerɛ wo wura dɛ
column6: Elija wɔ ha."

column3: Ebɛnadze mu na mayɛ bɔn
column4: ma ɔwo epɛ dɛ iyi w'akowaa hyɛ Ahab nsa

column2: "Dɛ EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn tse ase yi
column3: ɔman biara
column4: anaa ahenman biara nnyi hɔ a mo wura nnsomae ma wɔnnkɔr hɔ nnkɔhwehwɛɛ wo: na sɛ wɔse dɛ
column5: Onnyi ha a ɔma ahenman no na ɔman no ka ntam dɛ wonnhun wo."

column3: Kɔ
column4: kɛka kyerɛ wo wura dɛ
column6: Elija wɔ ha."

column3: sɛ mefi wo nkyɛn mokɔ ara a
column4: nkyɛ EWURADZE no sunsum no ehwim wo akɔ beebi mbrɛ minnyim; na dɛm ntsi sɛ mokɔ kɛka kyerɛ Ahab
column6: oboku me: na emi
column8: mifi me mberantsɛ mu ara na musuro EWURADZE."

column2: "Ana wɔnnkaa dza aber a Jezebel rukuku EWURADZE no nkɔnhyɛfo no meyɛe no nnkyerɛɛ mo wura
column3: mbrɛ misii na mefaa EWURADZE no nkɔnhyɛfo no mu mbarimba ɔha
column4: na medze hɔn eduonum eduonum kosumasumaa ɔbo tu mu
column5: na medze edziban na nsu mohwɛɛ hɔn no?"

column3: Kɔ
column4: kɛka kyerɛ wo wura dɛ
column6: Elija wɔ ha: na oboku me."

column3: Dɛ dɔm EWURADZE a migyina n'enyim tse ase yi
column4: ampa mibeyi moho edzi makyerɛ no ndɛ da yi."

column2: "Nna Obadia sii mu kɔree kehyiaa Ahab na ɔkaa kyerɛɛ no: na Ahab kɔree kehyiaa Elija."

column3: aber a Ahab hun Elija no
column4: Ahab see no dɛ
column6: ɔwo Israel no fonafo nye no?"

column3: Emi mommfonaa Israel; mbom ɔwoara
column4: na w'egya fie a
column5: wɔ dɛ hom apow EWURADZE ne mbransɛm
column6: na ɔwo ekedzi Baalim ekyir."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi afei soma na wɔnkɔboaboa Israel nyinara ano mbrɛ me wɔ bepɔw Karmel do
column3: na Baal nkɔnhyɛfo ahaanan eduonum no
column4: na Asera nkɔnhyɛfo ahaanan a wodzidzi Jezebel no pon do no."

column2: "Nna Ahab somae ma wɔkɔr Israelmba no nyinara mu
column3: na wɔkɔboaboaa nkɔnhyɛfo no ano kɔr Karmel bepɔw do."

column2: "Na Elija baa ɔman no nyinara nkyɛn
column3: na obisaa dɛ
column4: Hom rigyina adwen ebien ntamu ma ekodu dabɛn? Sɛ EWURADZE nye Nyankopɔn a
column5: hom ndzi n'ekyir: sɛ Baal so a
column6: ɔno hom ndzi n'ekyir. Na ɔman no emmbua no asɛm biara."

column3: Emi
column4: manko ara nye EWURADZE no nkɔnhyɛnyi a ɔaka; na Baal nkɔnhyɛfo dze hom yɛ mbarimba ahaanan eduonum."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi ma wɔmma hɛn anantwi ebien; na ma wɔnsan mu nyi nantwisaa kor mma hɔnho
column3: na wontwitwa no esinesin
column4: na wɔmfa ngu nyena no do
column5: na mma wɔmmfa gya nngu ase: na mo so mibesiesie nantwisaa kor no
column6: na medze egu nyena no do

column2: "Na hom mfrɛ hom nyame ne dzin
column3: na mo so mebɛfrɛ EWURADZE ne dzin: na onyame a ɔdze gya bɛgye do no
column4: wɔmma ɔno nyɛ Nyankopɔn. Na ɔman no nyinara buae see dɛ

column2: "Na Elija see Baal nkɔnhyɛfo no dɛ
column3: Hom nsan mu nyi nantwisaa kor mma homho
column4: na hom ndzi kan nsiesie no; osiandɛ hom dɔɔ so; na hom mfrɛ hom nyame ne dzin
column5: mbom mma wɔmmfa gya nngu ase."

column2: "Na wɔfaa nantwisaa no a wɔdze maa hɔn no
column3: na wosiesiei
column4: na wɔfrɛɛ Baal ne dzin fi anapa araa kodur wigyinae dɛ
column6: tsie hɛn. Naaso nna ndze bi nnyi hɔ
column7: na nyia ɔgye do biara so nnyi hɔ. Na wohuruhuruwii kyiin afɔrmbukyia no a wɔyɛe no ho."

column3: Elija sii hɔn atwetwe see dɛ
column4: Hom mfa ndze kɛse ntsea mu: na ɔyɛ nyame; sisei ɔrodwen
column6: anaa oetu kwan

column3: na wɔdze asekan na nkambaa twitwaa hɔnho dɛ mbrɛ hɔn ndzeyɛɛ tse no
column4: kodur dɛ bɔgya sɔɔn hɔn ho."

column3: aber a wigyinae twaa mu no
column4: wɔhyɛɛ nkɔm araa kodur dɛ ɔrokɔ ewimbir afɔr no bɔber; naaso ndze biara nnyi hɔ
column5: na nyia ɔgye do so nnyi hɔ
column6: na obiara so nnyi hɔ a ɔhwɛ."

column2: "Na Elija see ɔman no nyinara dɛ
column3: Hom ntwe mpin me; na ɔman no nyinara twee piin no. Na ɔyɛɛ EWURADZE afɔrmbukyia a ebubu no yie."
dɛ mbrɛ Jakob ne mba ebusuakuw ebusuakuw no dodow tse
column4: ɔno a EWURADZE n'asɛm baa ne nkyɛn dɛ
column5: Israel nye wo dzin no a."

column2: "Na ɔdze abo no sii afɔrmbukyia wɔ EWURADZE ne dzin mu; na otwaa ɔka a obedzi aba a wogu etwadze ebien wɔ afɔrmbukyia no ho hyiae."

column3: na otwitwaa nantwisaa no epruw
column4: na wɔdze guu nyena no do. Na ɔsee dɛ
column5: Hom mfa nsu nhyehyɛ esuhina anan amaama
column6: na wonhue ngu ɔhyew afɔr

column3: Hom nyɛ no mprɛnu; na wɔyɛɛ no mprɛnu. Na ɔsee dɛ
column4: Hom nyɛ no mprɛnsa

column2: "Na nsu no peem afɔrmbukyia no ho hyiae; na ɔdze nsu hyɛɛ ɔka no so ma."
"Na ɔbaa dɛ ewimbir afɔr no bɔber mu no
column3: nkɔnhyɛnyi Elija twee pinii
column4: na ɔsee dɛ
column6: Abraham
column8: ndɛ da yi ma wonhu dɛ ɔwoara nye Nyankopɔn wɔ Israel mu
column10: na mayɛ ndzɛmba yi nyinara wɔ w'asɛm do."

column3: EWURADZE tsie me
column4: ma ɔman yi eehu dɛ ɔwoara
column6: na ɔwoara adan hɔn akoma asan aba bio."

column3: na ɔbɛhyeew ɔhyew afɔr no
column4: na nyena no
column6: na ɔtafeer nsu a ɔwɔ ɔka no mu no."

column2: "Na aber a ɔman no nyinara hunii no
column3: wɔdze hɔn enyim butubutuuw famu: na wɔsee dɛ
column4: EWURADZE
column6: ɔno nye Nyankopɔn."

column3: Hom nkyer Baal no nkɔnhyɛfo no; mma hom mma hɔn mu kor mpo mmfi nsa. Na wɔkyeer hɔn: na Elija dze hɔn sianee baa ɔwora Kishon ho
column4: na okum hɔn wɔ hɔ."

column3: Fow kɔ
column4: kedzidzi na nom; na matse nsu kɛse nka."

column2: "Nna Ahab sii mu kɔr dɛ orikedzidzi na ɔanom. Na Elija sii mu kɔr Karmel n'etsifi; na ɔbɔɔ no mu adze wɔ famu
column3: na ɔdze n'enyim hyɛɛ n'anankoroma ntamu."
Afei fow kɔ
column4: kɔhwɛ pomu afamu. Na ɔfowee kɔree kɔhwɛe
column6: Hwee nnyi hɔ. Na ɔsee dɛ

column3: nna ɔsee dɛ
column4: Hwɛ
column5: mununkum bi fi pomu rosoɛr a osuar dɛ nyimpa ne nsakum. Na ɔsee dɛ
column6: Fow kɔ kɛse Ahab dɛ
column9: ma nsu no eennsiw wo kwan."

column3: na mununkum na mframa ebir ɔsor tumm
column4: na nsu kɛse tɔree. Na Ahab tutui kɔr Jezreel."

column2: "Na EWURADZE ne nsa baa Elija do; na ɔbɔɔ n'asen do
column3: na otuu mbirika dzii Ahab enyim kodur Jezreel ahɛnee."
